title: active_threat
description: An active threat reported near main entrance escalates to facility-wide lockdown.

timeline.title: Initial Report
timeline.description: Security receives call from lobby about suspicious individual displaying aggressive behavior.

timeline.title: Threat Confirmed
timeline.description: Security camera confirms individual has entered building with apparent weapon. Alert all personnel.

timeline.title: Lockdown Initiated
timeline.description: Activate facility-wide lockdown. All personnel shelter in place. Doors locked remotely.

timeline.title: Law Enforcement Notified
timeline.description: 911 called. Police en route, ETA 8 minutes. Maintain lockdown and account for all personnel.

timeline.title: Threat Movement
timeline.description: Subject moving toward administrative wing. Update all personnel on location. Do not engage.

timeline.title: Police Arrival
timeline.description: Law enforcement on-site. Maintain lockdown. Provide building schematics and camera access to police.

timeline.title: Threat Neutralized
timeline.description: Suspect in custody. Police conducting sweep. Prepare for all-clear and accountability checks.
